model.guiComponents

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.guiComponents.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the player's laptop. It can hold 'LaptopItems' (e.g. files and README txt documents).
    Author:
    Divya Patel - 300304450, Ellie Coyle - 300307071, Marcel van Workum - 300313949, Reuben Puketapu - 300310939
